sockio.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Socket I/O controls. 

 *
 * $Log: sockio.h,v $
 * Revision 1.1  2007/05/02 11:36:36  haraldkipp
 * First check-in.
 *
 *
 *


Defines

#define SIOCADDMULTI
 Add multicast address.
#define SIOCDELMULTI
 Delete multicast address.
#define SIOCGIFMTU
 Get interface MTU.
#define SIOCSIFMTU
 Set interface MTU.
#define SIOCADDRT
 Add route.
#define SIOCDELRT
 Delete route.
#define SIOCGIFNETMASK
 Get net addr mask.
#define SIOCSIFNETMASK
 Set net addr mask.
